attributes.action: Bedroom tax?as part of the deficit-reduction strategy.
attributes.additional_details:
After the shocking finding's by the UN investigator regarding the bedroom tax, I call for the bedroom tax to be scrapped for those that are really affected, such as the disabled, carers, pensioners, ex forces. After all they have paid into the system.

And as part of the deficit-reduction strategy, instead of coming up with solution to hit the needy, why don't you stop giving handouts to EU migrants such as slovakian gypsies, who seem to thrive on handouts, and are not interested in paying into the system. Just look into Firth Park/Page Hall Sheffield.

Fact, their is more money wasted in benefit handouts than saving on bedroom tax in the PageHall/FirthPark area of Sheffield.
